description.@en: As Cultists are wholly self-taught in the ways of Magick, the practice of their spells is messy and chaotic. Fortunate for Abyssal Princes sensitive to this errant way of thinking, Cultists and their ilk make easy prey, leading them down a path towards the blackest and most soul-corrupting of Magicks.

effect.@en: When you generate face ‘1’ or ‘6’ with Chaos Dice, you invoke a Chaos Manifestation.
